description: I'm a game, software, and web developer with a strong interest in technology, aerospace, and creative problem-solving. With experience in game design and web development using C# and Blazor, I combine technical skills with a strategic mindset. I'm fluent in Portuguese and English, and I'm driven by curiosity, precision, and a long-term goal of contributing to space exploration and innovation.
detailOrQuote: I don't chase stars. I build the engines to reach them.
